Name: BOOM Adventures
About the game: Grab a duck and hit a crab or grab a snowball and hit a snowman. This is the primary goal of the game There are two game modes. Campaign and survival. In both you can challenge your friends to check who is best thrower You have two worlds to choose from: Winter and Summer. Main pros: - Cute ducks - Simple mechanics - Low entry threshold - Scoreboard for every game mode - 3 difficulty levels
